metadata.title: CVE-2024-28830 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmkversions <2.3.0p7, <2.2.0p28, <2.1.0p45 and <=2.0.0p39 (EOL) causesautomation user secrets to be written to audit log files accessible toadministrators.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
